CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 5, 1958, pg. A5 reads: "AMEZ Soiree "Queen" - Mrs. Lucinda Harper, center, was crowned "queen" of the AME Zion Pittsburgh District garden soiree, Sunday, as president of the group, which reported the most over the given quota of patrons. Mrs. Bernice Dennis, left, president of the Missionary Society of Trinity AME Zion Church, McKees Rocks, took second prize.  The Rev. Sydney L. Smith, district presiding elder, crowns the "queen," while the Rev. John Carter, Trinity's pastor, looks on.  Mrs. Irene Glenn is president of Wesley Center Missionary Group 2, which placed third. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Queen" Lucinda Harper, being crowned by Rev. Sydney L. Smith, while Bernice Dennis and Rev. John Carter look on, posed on lawn during AME Zion Pittsburgh District garden soiree
